name: Crab
comments: These are the best baked potatoes ever
instructions: Bake potatoes in microwave on High for 7-9 minutes, or until knife slides easily in. Halve each potato lengthwise, scoop out flesh and leave skins intact. In large bowl, mash potatoes with butter. Add all remaining ingredients except cheese, then fill potato skins with mixture. Sprinkle with cheese and bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes.
